_header: Joy Thou Virgin as it is right
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of

CantAdd68.First Lines:
Ioy þou virgyn as it is ryȝtThe fader off hevyn he lovid
                    þe welleÞe angel gabriel off blys so brygthHe sent to
                    þe to tydyngges to telle…
CantAdd68.Last Lines:
…Lady off virtu & deuociounExaltyd be forn þe
                    triniteOff angell off lyȝt be mene of þi sounIoy thow euere
                    þer for to be
CantAdd68.Editions:
Woodruff,  Charles Eveleigh. 
             A XVth Century Guide Book to the Principal Churches of Rome Compiled c.
                1470 by William Brewyn.
         London: Marshall, 1933: 80.
